DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine different level physical activity impact ovarian reserve pre-menopausal period
DOC.detailed_description: Two group include : 1 . The study group : woman 20-35 year age practice high level physical activity , define International Physical Activity Questionnaire , past 3 year 2 . The control group : woman 20-35 year age practice low level physical activity , define International Physical Activity Questionnaire , past 3 year Women meet criterion inclusion recruit study sign consent form . Recruitment do sport center . The control group include woman examine gynecologic emergency department , sign consent form , meet control group 's inclusion criterion . These woman ask fulfill International Physical Activity Questionnaire additional questionnaire regard relevant demographic medical information ( see ) . Blood sample anti-mullerian hormone , leptin , hormonal profile obtain day 3 menstruation . Ultrasound perform measure Antral Follicular count ovarian blood flow . Data collection : 1 . Demographic information age , weight , height , BMI , marital status 2 . Medical information regard chronic disease medication 3 . Obstetrical history 4 . Information regard physical activity version International Physical Activity Questionnaire . 5 . Information menstrual behavior : irregularity ( yes/no ) frequency ( le 21 day 21-35 day , 35 day ) , menstrual duration ( le 3 day 3-7 day , 7 day ) bleeding amount accord number pad per day ( 1 , 2 , 4 5 pad ) . 6 . Hormonal profile - Follicle-stimulating hormone , Luteinizing hormone , progesterone , Estradiol , Thyroid-stimulating hormone . 7 . Antral Follicle Count , Anti-mullerian hormone 8 . Leptin level -reflecting metabolic change .
DOC.criteria: Study group : 1 . Women 2035 year age practice high level physical activity , define International Physical Activity Questionnaire , past 3 year 2 . BMI 1825 3 . Regular menstruation Control group : 1 . Women 2035 year age practice low level physical activity , define International Physical Activity Questionnaire , past 3 year 2 . BMI 1825 3 . Regular menstruation 1 . Polycystic ovary syndrome 2 . Endometriosis 3 . Diabetes 4 . Hyper/hypothyroidism 5 . BMI > 25 , BMI < 18 6 . Active past eating disorder
